issue.title: [Doc] Update implementation status
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14317](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14317). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now that Java got the C data interface (ARROW-12965), we should update the implementation status grid:
https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/docs/source/status.rst#c-data-interface
